se.cbb.jprime.seqevo

Class MultiAlignment<S extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Sequence<C>,C extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Compound>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava3.core.sequence.MultipleSequenceAlignment<S,C>
      • se.cbb.jprime.seqevo.MultiAlignment<S,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - Sequence type.
    C - Compound type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.LightweightProfile<S,C>

    public class MultiAlignment<S extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Sequence<C>,C extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.template.Compound>
extends org.biojava3.core.sequence.MultipleSequenceAlignment<S,C>
    Simple wrapper for BioJava's MultipleSequenceAlignment which tries to remedy the fact that there seems to be indexing inconsistencies in the latter (starting from 0 vs. starting from 1).
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
